creator: sonybank
descriptionHtml:
Opening a Sony Bank account is fast and easy

Designed especially for our Japan-based English-speaking customers, "Open Account - Sony Bank " provides you with a simple, safe and secure way to open a bank account. The app allows you to scan necessary documents, enter your personal information and submit everything directly from your smartphone. (Process should be done in one sitting.) No seal or complicated paperwork required.

*Only foreigners residing in Japan can open an account with “Open account” app. This “Open account” app is not available outside of Japan. Therefore, If you are temporarily staying outside of Japan, please apply after return to Japan.

USAGE
1. Download this app
2. Scan the necessary documents (*1)
3. Complete and confirm your personal information
4. Set account passwords
5. Submit your information
6. Receive your Sony Bank WALLET (*2)

*1. You will need to scan your Japan residence card, health insurance card, full name in katakana, etc. (The app will list the documents required depending on your length of stay in Japan to date.)

*2. Once we've set up your account, you'll receive your token in about 5 days and your Sony Bank WALLET (Cash card with Visa debit) in about 10 days. US citizens will need to sign additional papers, which might delay card delivery.

● You may only have one account with Sony Bank.
● Please make sure you read and have understood our terms and conditions.
descriptionShort: This app provides you with a fast and easy way to open a bank account in Japan.
title: Open Account - Sony Bank

descriptionShort: This app provides you with a fast and easy way to open a bank account in Japan.
title: Open Account - Sony Bank

creator: sonybank
descriptionHtml:
Open account with Open Account app in English.

Designed especially for international residents of Japan, Open Account app provides you with a safe and secure way to open a bank account.
This app allows you to scan necessary documents, enter your personal information and submit your application directly from your smartphone in one sitting. No seal or complicated paperwork required.

*Only international residents of Japan can open an account with Open Account app.
Please note that you can only apply for opening an account when you are physically located in Japan. Therefore, if you are temporarily staying outside of Japan, please apply after you return to Japan.

ACCOUNT OPENING FLOW *1
1. Download this app
2. Scan the necessary documents
3. Complete and confirm your personal information
4. Set account passwords
5. Submit your application
6. Receive your Sony Bank WALLET and token

*1. For more details, please check our guide about Account Opening Flow (https://moneykit.net/en/guide/account/)

● You may only have one account with Sony Bank.
● Please make sure you read and have understood our terms and conditions.

descriptionShort: Open a bank account in English
title: Sony Bank Open Account

creator: sonybank
descriptionHtml:
Open an account in English with the Sony Bank Open Account app

Designed especially for international residents of Japan, the Sony Bank Open Account app provides you with a safe and secure way to open a bank account.
This app allows you to scan required documents, enter your personal information and submit your application directly from your smartphone in one sitting.

The Sony Bank Open Account app is not available outside of Japan. Applications made from outside of Japan cannot be accepted.

How to Apply for a Sony Bank Account
Step 1: Install the app
Step 2: Scan the required documents and enter your information
Step 3: Set the required passwords
Step 4: Submit your application
Step 5: Receive the application confirmation email from Sony Bank

* Only international residents of Japan can open an account with the Sony Bank Open Account app.
* Each customer is limited to one Sony Bank account.
* Please note that U.S. citizens or those with jurisdiction of residence in countries other than Japan will be required to submit additional documentation.
* Please make sure you have read and understood our terms and conditions.
descriptionShort: Open a bank account in English

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Changed the description and some functions
